title: Mediterranean salad
ingredients: ['325g broad beans', '150g fusilli pasta, cooked', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'juice of 1/2 lemon', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh oregano', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '3 tomatoes, chopped', '1 pepper, chopped', '55g button mushrooms, sliced', '6 black olives, halved and pitted']
